title: lower range bound error when building master
body:
I built beta last night from source without any issue:

```bash
$ cd /builds/srwalker/rsdev/rust-beta.git/x86_64-sun-solaris/stage1/bin
$ ./rustc --version
rustc 1.16.0-dev (3f38cac7a 2017-02-09)
```

This morning I tried to build master:
```bash
$ CC=gcc CXX=g++ ./configure --prefix=/usr --default-linker=gcc --default-ar=/usr/bin/ar  --enable-local-rust --local-rust-root=/builds/srwalker/rsdev/rust-beta.git/x86_64-sun-solaris/stage1 --enable-extended
$ make -j8 VERBOSE=1
```

Which failed with:
```bash
   Compiling proc_macro v0.0.0 (file:///builds/srwalker/rsdev/rust.git/src/libproc_macro)
   Compiling rustc_back v0.0.0 (file:///builds/srwalker/rsdev/rust.git/src/librustc_back)
   Compiling rustc_const_math v0.0.0 (file:///builds/srwalker/rsdev/rust.git/src/librustc_const_math)
     Running `/builds/srwalker/rsdev/rust.git/build/bootstrap/debug/rustc --crate-name proc_macro src/libproc_macro/lib.rs --crate-type dylib -C prefer-dynamic -C
 opt-level=2 -C metadata=2cd900b83f9537fe -C extra-filename=-2cd900b83f9537fe --out-dir /builds/srwalker/rsdev/rust.git/build/x86_64-sun-solaris/stage0-rustc/x86_
64-sun-solaris/release/deps --emit=dep-info,link --target x86_64-sun-solaris -L dependency=/builds/srwalker/rsdev/rust.git/build/x86_64-sun-solaris/stage0-rustc/x
86_64-sun-solaris/release/deps -L dependency=/builds/srwalker/rsdev/rust.git/build/x86_64-sun-solaris/stage0-rustc/release/deps --extern syntax=/builds/srwalker/r
sdev/rust.git/build/x86_64-sun-solaris/stage0-rustc/x86_64-sun-solaris/release/deps/libsyntax-2c725755249394db.so`
     Running `/builds/srwalker/rsdev/rust.git/build/bootstrap/debug/rustc --crate-name rustc_back src/librustc_back/lib.rs --crate-type dylib -C prefer-dynamic -C
 opt-level=2 --cfg feature=\"jemalloc\" -C metadata=0b0085429af03761 -C extra-filename=-0b0085429af03761 --out-dir /builds/srwalker/rsdev/rust.git/build/x86_64-su
n-solaris/stage0-rustc/x86_64-sun-solaris/release/deps --emit=dep-info,link --target x86_64-sun-solaris -L dependency=/builds/srwalker/rsdev/rust.git/build/x86_64
-sun-solaris/stage0-rustc/x86_64-sun-solaris/release/deps -L dependency=/builds/srwalker/rsdev/rust.git/build/x86_64-sun-solaris/stage0-rustc/release/deps --extern syntax=/builds/srwalker/rsdev/rust.git/build/x86_64-sun-solaris/stage0-rustc/x86_64-sun-solaris/release/deps/libsyntax-2c725755249394db.so --extern log=/builds/srwalker/rsdev/rust.git/build/x86_64-sun-solaris/stage0-rustc/x86_64-sun-solaris/release/deps/liblog-57f509dc3a71daf9.so --extern log=/builds/srwalker/rsdev/rust.git/build/x86_64-sun-solaris/stage0-rustc/x86_64-sun-solaris/release/deps/liblog-57f509dc3a71daf9.rlib --extern serialize=/builds/srwalker/rsdev/rust.git/build/x86_64-sun-solaris/stage0-rustc/x86_64-sun-solaris/release/deps/libserialize-14a79a4ebc458dab.so --extern serialize=/builds/srwalker/rsdev/rust.git/build/x86_64-sun-solaris/stage0-rustc/x86_64-sun-solaris/release/deps/libserialize-14a79a4ebc458dab.rlib`
     Running `/builds/srwalker/rsdev/rust.git/build/bootstrap/debug/rustc --crate-name rustc_const_math src/librustc_const_math/lib.rs --crate-type dylib -C prefer-dynamic -C opt-level=2 -C metadata=944e69ca6ad82aec -C extra-filename=-944e69ca6ad82aec --out-dir /builds/srwalker/rsdev/rust.git/build/x86_64-sun-solaris/stage0-rustc/x86_64-sun-solaris/release/deps --emit=dep-info,link --target x86_64-sun-solaris -L dependency=/builds/srwalker/rsdev/rust.git/build/x86_64-sun-solaris/stage0-rustc/x86_64-sun-solaris/release/deps -L dependency=/builds/srwalker/rsdev/rust.git/build/x86_64-sun-solaris/stage0-rustc/release/deps --extern serialize=/builds/srwalker/rsdev/rust.git/build/x86_64-sun-solaris/stage0-rustc/x86_64-sun-solaris/release/deps/libserialize-14a79a4ebc458dab.so --extern serialize=/builds/srwalker/rsdev/rust.git/build/x86_64-sun-solaris/stage0-rustc/x86_64-sun-solaris/release/deps/libserialize-14a79a4ebc458dab.rlib --extern syntax=/builds/srwalker/rsdev/rust.git/build/x86_64-sun-solaris/stage0-rustc/x86_64-sun-solaris/release/deps/libsyntax-2c725755249394db.so`
error[E0030]: lower range bound must be less than or equal to upper
   --> src/librustc_const_math/int.rs:158:30
    |
158 |             (InferSigned(a @ 0...ibounds::U64MAX), U64(_)) => U64(a as u64),
    |                              ^ lower bound larger than upper bound

error[E0030]: lower range bound must be less than or equal to upper
   --> src/librustc_const_math/int.rs:162:30
    |
162 |             (InferSigned(a @ 0...ibounds::U64MAX), Usize(Us64(_))) => Usize(Us64(a as u64)),
    |                              ^ lower bound larger than upper bound

error: aborting due to 2 previous errors
```

Any ideas to what might be causing this?
